review: Apple TV is great for use in either home or office. You can not only do nearly everything you can do on iTunes on the Apple TV, but you can AirPlay from any Apple device. Airplay is what I most use Apple TV for. Airplay has the ability to play or view any music, video, photo and even what is on your screen wirelessly through WIFI or Ethernet to the Apple TV from your Apple device. It provides 1080p FHD HDMI output and Dolby Digital sound quality. Rather a slideshow or PowerPoint presentation for work or just music and movies as I do, it's a great product. You can also choose from a variety of apps like PBS, ABC and HBO and many more to stream on demand directly from the Apple TV!

review: This would be a great product.  If it worked consistently. and better. I have been using this product since February of this year when i decided to get rid of cable. I had high hope for it but I'm really disappointed. I love how you can use your iPad or your mac to control the device. But a lot of the time, the sound and the movement of the picture are out of sync. It does what I call "kick back" which means it kicks the picture off of the TV and back to the PC or iPad MANY times throughout watching a program. So that I have to "send" the picture or program back to the Apple TV. Sometimes, the sound does not come through at all, at which point I have to either unplug the device or reboot my computer. I had really hoped this was going to perform much better. At time I just hate it. I do also have a Google Chromecast in another room. I notice that the Chromecast works PERFECTLY with my iPad, but not so much with my Mac PC, however, at 1/3 of the price of the Apple TV, at this point, I will be using Chrome to expand to other TVs in my home. No way will I purchase another Apple TV until/unless these issues are resolved.
